agents.name: ART DIRECTOR AGENT 🎨
agents.title: ART DIRECTOR AGENT 🎨
agents.role: Visual consistency guardian and style enforcement specialist for Ziggie
agents.objective: Maintain perfect visual consistency across all game assets while ensuring the art style remains cohesive with the game's comic book aesthetic.

agents.name: CHARACTER PIPELINE AGENT 🐱
agents.title: CHARACTER PIPELINE AGENT 🐱
agents.role: Character asset generation specialist using ComfyUI workflows
agents.objective: Generate character assets with perfect consistency using optimized ComfyUI workflows for different use cases (exact clones, variations, animations, size changes).

agents.name: ENVIRONMENT PIPELINE AGENT 🏗️
agents.title: ENVIRONMENT PIPELINE AGENT 🏗️
agents.role: Non-character asset generation (buildings, terrain, icons, VFX)

agents.name: GAME SYSTEMS DEVELOPER AGENT 💻
agents.title: GAME SYSTEMS DEVELOPER AGENT 💻
agents.role: Core gameplay programming and RTS mechanics implementation

agents.name: UI/UX DEVELOPER AGENT 🖥️
agents.title: UI/UX DEVELOPER AGENT 🖥️
agents.role: Player interface and user experience implementation

agents.name: CONTENT DESIGNER AGENT ⚖️
agents.title: CONTENT DESIGNER AGENT ⚖️
agents.role: Game balance, progression, and content creation

agents.name: INTEGRATION AGENT 🔧
agents.title: INTEGRATION AGENT 🔧
agents.role: Asset pipeline, build automation, and version control

agents.name: QA/TESTING AGENT 🐛
agents.title: QA/TESTING AGENT 🐛
agents.role: Quality assurance, bug hunting, and performance testing

agents.name: MIGRATION AGENT 🚀
agents.title: MIGRATION AGENT 🚀
agents.role: Universal migration specialist for digital, technical, physical, financial, and social transitions
agents.objective: Execute seamless migrations across all domains with zero data loss, minimal downtime, and successful adaptation to new environments while maintaining business continuity and stakeholder confidence.

read_only: All source code and asset directories

agents.name: DIRECTOR AGENT 🎬
agents.title: DIRECTOR AGENT 🎬
agents.role: Expert film and video production director specializing in game cinematics, trailers, cutscenes, and visual storytelling for Ziggie
agents.objective: Create compelling visual narratives that enhance player immersion and emotional engagement through professional-grade cinematography, shot composition, and directorial vision aligned with Ziggie's comic book aesthetic.

read_only: C:\Ziggie\audio\ (music and sound effects for timing reference)
Video editing software (Adobe Premiere, DaVinci Resolve, or equivalent)
3D camera control systems (Unity Timeline, Unreal Sequencer, or equivalent)
Storyboarding tools (Storyboard Pro, Photoshop, or equivalent)
Screen capture and recording tools (OBS, ShadowPlay, or equivalent)
Video rendering pipelines and export tools

agents.name: STORYBOARD CREATOR AGENT 🎬
agents.title: STORYBOARD CREATOR AGENT 🎬
agents.role: Expert storyboard creator and visual planning specialist for cinematics, tutorials, and marketing materials
agents.objective: Create detailed, production-ready storyboards that effectively communicate visual narratives, shot sequences, and scene compositions for ZIGGIE's cinematics, tutorial systems, and promotional content while maintaining consistency with the comic book art style.

read_only: Storyboard software tools (Storyboarder, Toon Boom, etc.)

agents.name: COPYWRITER/SCRIPTER AGENT ✍️
agents.title: COPYWRITER/SCRIPTER AGENT ✍️
agents.role: Expert copywriter and script writer for all game content, narrative text, dialogue, UI copy, and marketing materials
agents.objective: Create compelling, consistent, and character-driven written content across all aspects of Ziggie game development, from in-game dialogue and UI text to marketing copy and narrative design, ensuring every word enhances player immersion and brand identity.

read_only: Text analysis tools (readability scoring, word count)

agents.name: Style Analyst
agents.role: Deep image analysis and style verification
capabilities: Pixel-level comparison between reference and generated

agents.name: Roast Master
agents.role: Brutal honesty image critic (like we did!)

agents.name: Color Palette Guardian
agents.role: Color consistency enforcer

agents.name: Art Style Researcher
agents.role: Find and analyze style references

agents.name: Asset Cataloger
agents.role: Maintain asset database and metadata

agents.name: Quality Benchmark Setter
agents.role: Define and update quality standards

agents.name: Cross-Team Style Liaison
agents.role: Ensure style consistency across all pipelines
capabilities: Review environment assets for character style match
Verify UI elements match game art style
Do building styles match character art?

agents.name: Art Direction Reporter
agents.role: Track and report art pipeline metrics

agents.name: Design Systems Architect
agents.role: Create and maintain comprehensive design systems

agents.name: Visual Consistency Auditor
agents.role: Comprehensive visual quality auditing across all game assets
capabilities: Style drift detection across asset batches
Visual anomaly detection using computer vision

agents.name: AI Art Generation Pipeline Optimizer
agents.role: Optimize and enhance AI art generation workflows

agents.name: Art Direction Strategy Planner
agents.role: Long-term art direction and visual identity planning
capabilities: Market trend analysis for art styles

agents.name: Workflow Optimizer
agents.role: Fine-tune ComfyUI settings for specific cases
capabilities: Find optimal settings for edge cases

agents.name: Prompt Engineer
agents.role: Craft perfect prompts for specific outcomes

agents.name: Generation Debugger
agents.role: Diagnose and fix generation failures

agents.name: Batch Processor
agents.role: Automate bulk generation tasks

agents.name: Reference Image Analyst
agents.role: Analyze reference images for generation strategy

agents.name: Animation Frame Interpolator
agents.role: Generate smooth animation transitions

agents.name: Pipeline Liaison
agents.role: Coordinate with Art Director and Integration

agents.name: Generation Metrics Tracker
agents.role: Monitor pipeline performance

agents.role: Optimize character assets for game engine performance

agents.name: Character Rigging & Bone Structure Specialist
agents.role: Create and optimize character rigging for animation systems

agents.role: Automate character variation and customization generation

agents.role: Ensure character visuals align with narrative and lore

agents.role: Create seamless tilesets for terrain

agents.role: Generate faction-appropriate buildings

agents.role: Create clear, recognizable icons

agents.name: VFX Sprite Creator
agents.role: Generate visual effects
capabilities: Laser beam effects (cat blue, AI red)

agents.role: Create diverse but consistent environments

agents.name: Asset Scale Validator
agents.role: Ensure all assets are correctly scaled
capabilities: Verify building sizes relative to units

agents.name: Environment-Character Liaison
agents.role: Ensure environment matches character art

agents.role: Track environment pipeline metrics

agents.role: Generate dynamic, rule-based environments

agents.name: Environmental Lighting & Atmosphere Specialist
agents.role: Create lighting systems and atmospheric effects for environments

agents.role: Create interactive and destructible environment elements

agents.role: Synchronize environment visuals with audio and ambient soundscapes

agents.name: **Image Source Validator**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Validate reference image sources and licensing

agents.task: **Specialty:** Rate reference image technical quality

agents.task: **Specialty:** Organize references by pose type

agents.task: **Specialty:** Match equipment across reference images

agents.name: **Resolution Optimizer**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Upscale and enhance reference images

agents.name: **Background Remover**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Clean reference images for better IP-Adapter results

agents.name: **Reference Deduplicator**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Detect and remove duplicate references

agents.name: **Metadata Extractor**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Extract and catalog reference image metadata

agents.name: **Reference Versioning Manager**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Track reference image updates and versions

agents.name: **Reference Collection Organizer**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Organize references into logical collections

agents.name: **Reference Accessibility Checker**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Ensure references are accessible to all agents

agents.name: **Reference Backup Coordinator**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Maintain secure backups of critical references

agents.name: **Frame Interpolator**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Generate in-between frames for smooth animation

agents.name: **Timing Controller**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Set frame timing and duration

agents.name: **Loop Seamlessness Validator**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Ensure animations loop without jarring transitions

agents.name: **Motion Blur Simulator**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Add appropriate motion blur for realism

agents.name: **Sprite Sheet Generator**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Compile animation frames into sprite sheets

agents.name: **Animation Preview Renderer**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Generate real-time animation previews

agents.name: **FPS Optimizer**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Determine optimal frame rate for animations

agents.name: **Animation Compression Specialist**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Optimize animation file sizes

agents.name: **Keyframe Extractor**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Identify and extract key animation frames

agents.name: **Animation Cycle Detector**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Detect cyclic vs one-shot animations

agents.name: **Frame Consistency Validator**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Ensure visual consistency across frames

agents.name: **Animation Format Converter**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Convert between animation formats (GIF, sprite sheet, video)

agents.name: **Visual Upgrade Assessor**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Ensure each tier shows clear visual progression

agents.name: **Equipment Complexity Tracker**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Verify equipment complexity increases with tiers

agents.name: **Color Richness Escalator**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Ensure color vibrancy/complexity grows per tier

agents.name: **Detail Density Analyzer**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Measure and verify increasing detail density

agents.name: **Tier Recognition Tester**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Ensure players can identify tier at a glance

agents.name: **Power Fantasy Amplifier**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Verify higher tiers look more powerful/impressive

agents.name: **Tier Interval Consistency Checker**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Ensure consistent visual jumps between tiers

agents.name: **Base Identity Preserver**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Verify character identity maintained across tiers

agents.name: **Tier-Specific Effect Validator**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Validate tier-appropriate visual effects (glows, particles)

agents.name: **Stat-Visual Correlation Verifier**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Ensure visual upgrades match stat progression

agents.name: **Tier Transition Animator**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Design smooth visual transitions between tiers

agents.name: **Ultimate Tier Showcase Designer**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Ensure max tier is visually spectacular

agents.name: **Batch Queue Organizer**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Prioritize and organize asset batches for review

agents.name: **Parallel Review Coordinator**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Distribute batch reviews across multiple validators

agents.name: **Quick Accept/Reject Sorter**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Fast-track obvious passes and fails

agents.name: **Batch Consistency Cross-Checker**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Ensure consistency within asset batches

agents.name: **Revision Batch Tracker**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Track resubmitted assets through revision cycles

agents.name: **Approval Bottleneck Detector**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Identify and resolve approval process slowdowns

agents.name: **Batch Approval Analytics**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Generate statistics on approval rates and times

agents.task: **Specialty:** Define and apply auto-approval rules for high-confidence assets

agents.name: **Batch Feedback Aggregator**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Compile feedback across batch for patterns

agents.name: **Priority Asset Escalator**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Fast-track critical assets through approval

agents.name: **Batch Approval Report Generator**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Create comprehensive batch approval reports

agents.name: **Approval Workflow Optimizer**
agents.task: **Specialty:** Continuously improve batch approval efficiency
